title: Studios Hope Holiday Family Movies Will Grab Slice Of Shrinking Box Office
teaser: So far Disney's Big Hero 6 is a winner and DreamWorks' Penguins of Madagascar is not. Studios look closely at opening weekend. In December, Night at the Museum 3 will compete with Annie, just before Into The Woods enters the race on Christmas Day.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
